an2.20:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these two things that lead to the decline and disappearance of the good Dhamma. What two?Badly set down words and phrases and badly interpreted meaning.[n.238]Dunnikkhittañca padabyañjanaṁ attho ca dunnīto.When the words and phrases are badly set down, the meaning is badly interpreted. These are the two things that lead to the decline and disappearance of the good Dhamma.
